I was working on #25929 which adds a new group level setting and also allows to assign permissions to group creator. I need some suggestions for the UI that should be shown in edit group form when the current value of setting is assigned to group creator. I think we can choose one of the following options:-

  1. Screenshot-from-2023-09-04-11-44-25.png

  2. Screenshot-from-2023-09-04-11-50-31.png

I would like to get thoughts of people on which option is better.

Also while showing edit group form for group creator I think we should show the option as "You" which will have the following UI.
Screenshot-from-2023-09-04-12-06-36.png

I would appreciate suggestions on this as well whether to show "You" or the same UI as in last message.

Ujjawal Modi said:

I think this relates to working toward a unified pill design across the app, which @Palash Baderia is working on but which also needs feedback from others.
@Ujjawal Modi I think you can probably go with the second non-pill options for a first version of this; that seems a bit more natural to me.
